```{r setup}
library(glycoCapacityPredictR)
```

```{r load}
input_data <- as.matrix(read.table(system.file("extdata", "GT_FPKM.csv", package = "glycoCapacityPredictR", mustWork = T), header = T, sep = ',', row.names = 1))
```

```{r}
output_data <- main(input_data, organism = 'human', quantile_cutoff = c(0.25, 0.75), reference_gene = 'DPAGT1', log_transform = 'log')
```

```{r}
head(output_data$normalised_expression)
head(output_data$expression_quantiles)
head(output_data$predicted_expression$FPKM_6e)
```
